en: It's my birthdaaaay! Time to stay out all night and party like we did in college! It wouldn't be the same without my partner-in-crime.
You feel a bit guilty that you forgot Takashi's birthday, so you spend a bit more on him than you wanted to. He ends the night happy, and you get less work done the next day due to the hangover.
Sometimes achieving your dreams requires sacrifices. But as you turn him down, you hear the disappointment in his voice. It stays with you all night.
